verses.name: 2 Chronicles 15:4
verses.text: But when they in their trouble did turn unto the Lord God of Israel, and sought him, he was found of them.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 15:5
verses.text: And in those times there was no peace to him that went out, nor to him that came in, but great vexations were upon all the inhabitants of the countries.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 15:6
verses.text: And nation was destroyed of nation, and city of city: for God did vex them with all adversity.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 15:7
verses.text: Be ye strong therefore, and let not your hands be weak: for your work shall be rewarded.
